remarks: Polynomial evaluation builder for multiplication of polynomials. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jul-2015.)
statement:
evl1addd.q $e |- O = ( eval1 ` R ) $.
evl1addd.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
evl1addd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
evl1addd.u $e |- U = ( Base ` P ) $.
evl1addd.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. CRing ) $.
evl1addd.2 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
evl1addd.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( M e. U /\ ( ( O ` M ) ` Y ) = V ) ) $.
evl1addd.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( N e. U /\ ( ( O ` N ) ` Y ) = W ) ) $.
evl1muld.t $e |- .xb = ( .r ` P ) $.
evl1muld.s $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
evl1muld $p |- ( ph -> ( ( M .xb N ) e. U /\ ( ( O ` ( M .xb N ) ) ` Y ) = ( V .x. W ) ) ) $.
